title: [CBM] Date a Live 1-12+OVA Complete (Dual Audio) [BDRip-1080p-8b
description:

Itsuka Shido is a high school boy. On the last day of the spring holidays, an explosion destroys the town
and a girl in armor appears in front of him. Shido's sister-in-law, Kotori, tells him that the girl is called
"Special Disasterous Designated Creature: Spirit", which causes a timespace quake. Kotori disclosed that
she is the commander of the anti-spirit organization Ratatosk and orders him to go out on a date with the
spirit girl. Kotori says, "I don't ask you to beat the spirit. Just let her fall in love with you and save the world."


VIDEO
- Video Source: BD-J
- Video Codec: H.264/AVC
- Video Resolution: 1920x1080p HD (16:9)
- Video FPS: 23.976

AUDIO
- Codec: AC3 & FLAC
- Track 1: English: 5.1ch (AC3 640Kbps)
- Track 2: Japanese: Stereo (FLAC 24bit)

SUBTITLES
- Track 1: English Signs/Songs
- Track 2: English Subtitles

EXTRAS
- English Commentary
